amendment.description: To establish as a standing order of the Senate that a Senator publicly disclose a notice of intent to objecting to any measure or matter.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4019 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4019 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3693-3694; text: CR S3693) To establish as a standing order of the Senate that a Senator publicly disclose a notice of intent to objecting to any measure or matter.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4019 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 3739.
